metadata.title: Documents related to the case of The State of Texas vs. Frank Ackerman, cause no. 783, 1872

creator.info: Deputy Clerk, District Court, Henderson County
creator.name: Richardson, M. E.

creator.info: Deputy Clerk, District Court, Henderson County
creator.name: Holland, B. C.

metadata.description: Documents related to the case of The State of Texas vs. Frank Ackerman, accused of carrying arms, filed July 12, 1872. Documents include a letter of indictment signed by grand jury foreman Phil W. Thompson, an application for attachment, and a request for witnesses.
3 documents ; various sizes, folded, in an orange envelope 22 x 10 cm. Documents are handwritten in ink and pencil on paper and printed forms.
metadata.subject: Government and Law - Legal Documents
Ackerman, Frank
Ballard, W. H.
